titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: SHARED NEEDLE OR SYRINGE IN LAST 4 WEEKS (Retired) - Description

p.b: This item has been retired from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

div.p: The last live version of this item is available in the February 2014 release of the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

p.b: Access to this version can be obtained by emailing information.standards@nhs.net with "NHS Data Model and Dictionary - Archive Request" in the email subject line.
